sentences.sentence: It's the ottava rima in which all of the great Italian romance epics poets had been written.
sentences.translation: 所有伟大的意大利浪漫主义诗人都写过八行体。

sentences.sentence: Terza rima is coded "prophecy" because it is in the tradition of Dante.
sentences.translation: 三行体被编写为，“预言”因为“，这是但丁遗留下来的传统。”

sentences.sentence: This high forward oblique view of Rima Ariadaeus on the moon was photographed by the Apollo 10 crew in May 1969.
sentences.translation: 这张高清晰的月球阿丽阿黛月溪斜视图是由阿波罗10号飞船于1969年5月拍摄的。
